meanings.definition: Of or relating to a scalene muscle.
meanings.sent1: The scalenus muscle helps with neck movements.
meanings.sent2: She felt sore in her scalenus muscle after exercising.
meanings.sent3: The scalenus muscle decided to take a break from all the stretching.
meanings.sent4: His scalenus muscle was as tight as a coiled spring.
meanings.sent5: The physical therapist explained how important it is to stretch the scalenus muscle regularly.

meanings.sent1: The scalenus of the triangle measured differently on each side.
meanings.sent2: The architect used a scalenus in the blueprint for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The scalenus triangle rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a scalenus of conflicting thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful scalenus in the landscape, adding a unique touch to the scene.
